title: Margaret living with LAM
brief_description: Bernadette Wells recounts her sister Margaret’s battle with a rare lung disease called Lymphangioleimyomatosis (LAM). But mostly she pays tribute to Margaret’s unwavering dedication as a nurse. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with Arts Victoria.
